title: Bloody Bozeman: The Perilous Trail to Montana's Gold
description: The Bozeman Trail led to the goldfields of Montana for six years in the 1860s before the army abandoned its three forts along the way, yielding to Red Cloud and his warriors. Hailed by A. B. Guthrie Jr. as "among the very best in the American Trail series," The Bloody Bozeman weaves an "almost seamless" pattern of destiny and adventure.
author: Dorothy M. Johnson
